# model_evaluation { #model_auto_interpret.model_evaluation }

`model_evaluation`



## Functions

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [model_evaluation_plotting](#model_auto_interpret.model_evaluation.model_evaluation_plotting) | Compute standard classification metrics and confusion matrix artifacts. |

### model_evaluation_plotting { #model_auto_interpret.model_evaluation.model_evaluation_plotting }

```python
model_evaluation.model_evaluation_plotting(pipeline, X_test, y_test)
```

Compute standard classification metrics and confusion matrix artifacts.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type                                           | Description                                                               | Default    |
|----------|------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| pipeline | sklearn estimator or sklearn.pipeline.Pipeline | Fitted model object that implements .predict() and .score().              | _required_ |
| X_test   | pandas.DataFrame                               | Test features. Must not contain NaNs.                                     | _required_ |
| y_test   | array-like of shape (n_samples,)               | Test labels (pandas Series, numpy array, or list). Must not contain NaNs. | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name       | Type                                   | Description                                                       |
|------------|----------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| accuracy   | float                                  | Classification accuracy on the test data.                         |
| f2         | float                                  | F2 score (beta=2) using positive label "Y".                       |
| y_pred     | numpy.ndarray                          | Predicted labels for the test data.                               |
| cm_table   | pandas.DataFrame                       | Confusion matrix table (rows=true labels, cols=predicted labels). |
| cm_display | sklearn.metrics.ConfusionMatrixDisplay | Confusion matrix display object.                                  |

#### Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description                                                            |
|--------|------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | TypeError  | If inputs have invalid types, or if pipeline is not fitted.            |
|        | ValueError | If X_test and y_test lengths differ, or if X_test/y_test contain NaNs. |
